title: I got called "little nig" and I AM THE ONE GOT BANNED?
body:
I was playing a casual normal game, then there is this vlad went inting because i took few cs.
Vlad then went on to call me "little nig" and also called my fellow teammate Kayn an animal.
I would want to know why am I banned when I am the victim.
Riot please respond as soon as possible.

replies.body: Please post your chat logs if you'd like us to identify why you were punished. Remember that retaliation is not permitted and will get you punished just as if you were a sole aggressor.

You say this like being a victim excuses you from also victimizing someone else.  You are responsible for your own actions, just as they are for theirs.  You got what you earned and so will they.

Now, if you really want to talk about this let's start with what you did that game.
Logs or it didn't happen.  ðŸ™ƒ

Sticking up for yourself isn't required in a fucking video game. Mute and report later on. "self defense" is the second worst excuse you can give behind "bad kids need to know how bad they are"

I don't see how we can help with such a limited amount of information. How could we have any idea why you were banned based on this? Post chat logs if you actually do want to know... but I have a feeling this is just a pointless, venting post.

I read the title as I got called "little ring" I was like that's not so bad.

I had to do a double take when I reread it, but the real question is.... what did you say to get yourself banned?
If either of you reported that Vladimir then he is probably getting banned too.
